projects.name: LessonCraft
projects.nextAction: Jeff: git pull → Xcode Archive → TestFlight upload. Update Privacy Policy URL in App Store Connect to https://aituned.io/privacy
projects.description: AI-powered LDS lesson & talk preparation app with documentary series, firesides, devotionals, live session, games, and study tools
projects.lastMilestone: Feb 12: Major UI overhaul — Morning Light calendar strip, Easter calendar strip with notifications (Mar 24–Apr 8), image-backed intent cards, Study tab redesign, multi-product print store (7 product types + frame colors), share URL fix (aituned.io/listen), gallery category browser with 9 filter chips, square HomeView cards, in-app Privacy Policy & Terms of Service. All pushed to origin/main.

projects.name: LessonCraft Content Pipeline
projects.nextAction: Complete CFM Teaching Coach rollout to all 52 weeks (sample approved for Week 7). Generate TikTok video content for art reveals.
projects.description: Content production: CFM Documentary (52 weeks), Easter series (3 sub-series, 15 eps), Morning Light devotionals (49 eps), Personal Firesides (10 eps), artwork library (120+ pieces)
projects.lastMilestone: 126/126 episodes with audio on R2 (verified Feb 12). Voice re-generation complete — 267 files, 0 failures. All 6 narrators on final roster. Catalog v1 live at api.aituned.io/api/catalog.

projects.name: JD Art Gallery & Print Store
projects.nextAction: Deploy Stripe webhook secret (wrangler secret put). Jeff: register jacquedubois.art domain. Expand gallery to 150+ pieces. Build orientation-aware print previews with frame mockups.
projects.description: Jacque Dubois Fine Art Gallery — in-app gallery browser, Printful print-on-demand integration, Stripe checkout. 120 gallery pieces on R2 across 9 collections. jacquedubois.art website live. Print purchase = 1 free month premium.
projects.lastMilestone: Feb 12: Print store upgraded to 7 product types (canvas wrap, framed canvas, framed poster, framed poster w/ mat, metal print, poster w/ hanger, rolled poster) + frame color picker. Gallery catalog at 120 artworks. Gallery website rebuilt with all real images. Printful token bug fixed in worker. 6 new artworks generated (jd-133 to jd-138). Worker deployed: 89f7890c.

projects.name: Gospel Tuned Empire

projects.description: B2B enterprise AI platform website. Rewritten Feb 12 — removed all faith-based content. 6 industries: Healthcare, Legal, Financial Services, Manufacturing, Energy & Utilities, Construction. Deployed on Cloudflare Pages.
projects.lastMilestone: Feb 12: Complete B2B enterprise rewrite deployed. Contact email updated to support@tredtechnologies.com.
